components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to MTN/Spacetel in Syrian Arab Republic

incident_updates.body: We are again experiencing SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to MTN/Spacetel in Syrian Arab Republic. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to MTN/Spacetel in Syrian Arab Republic. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Flex Team is conducting planned maintenance on Tuesday, March 25, 2025 at 04:00am UTC. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 45 minutes. This is a part of Taskrouter database planned module migration. The expected downtime would be around 10 seconds.

affected_components.name: FLEX - TaskRouter
FLEX - Flex Routing

scheduled_maintenances.name: Singapore SMS Carrier Maintenance - SingTel

incident_updates.body:
The SingTel network in Singapore is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 25 March 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 01 April 2025 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from SingTel Singapore handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

25 March 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 25 March 2025 at 14:00 PDT
01 April 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 01 April 2025 at 14:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Maintenance for the Primary Phone numbers Database

incident_updates.body:
This scheduled maintenance affects: MESSAGING, PHONE NUMBERS, PROGRAMMABLE VOICE (SIP Interface) and STUDIO.

[Impact]:
-Country impacted - Worldwide (Region - US1 directly affected, AU1/IE1 indirectly affected)

[customer experience]:
-There will be a brief general outage of the phone numbers database migration when the old database stops processing old requests and before the new database picks up the new requests.
-There will be about 1 hour delay in regional communication between the databases and other distributed services. There is potential impact on Studio flows containing phone numbers with missing callback URL. All those issues should self-resolve upon conclusion of the window.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - MMS
PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - SMS
PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - SIP Interface
PHONE NUMBERS
SERVERLESS - Studio

scheduled_maintenances.name: Proxy scheduled maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance activity: We would be updating the Proxy database version in the US1 region. There are pre and post activities around this maintenance and hence this longer maintenance window of 1.5 hours. The actual database version upgrade, however, is expected to be take approximately 3 minutes. 

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system performance during and after this maintenance window as well to ensure everything runs smoothly.

Contingency plan: In the unlikely event of encountering any issues, we are prepared to immediately revert the changes. Should a rollback be deemed necessary, then there could be a short downtime of approximately 5 minutes.

affected_components.name: FLEX - Proxy

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Programmable Messaging  (Messaging Channels) and Verify - Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 20:00 to 20:30 PDT on 04/02/2025. During the maintenance window, customers will experience the following issues with WhatsApp, RCS, and Facebook Messenger:

- Message delays: Inbound and outbound messages may be delayed by up to 5 minutes.
- Outbound message failures: Messages with a validity period of less than 100 seconds may fail with error code 30036.
- Sender management issues: Creation, updates, or deletions of senders may fail during this window and will need to be retried afterward

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE MESSAGING - Messaging Channels
ACCOUNT SECURITY - Verify

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 March 2025 at 20:00 PST until 27 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT. 05 March 2025 at 20:00 PST until 06 March 2025 at 00:00 PST
12 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 13 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT
19 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 20 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT
26 March 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 27 March 2025 at 00:00 PDT

We are aware of the short notice. We are working to provide earlier notification where possible.
